channel.title: CVE Feed for mainwp -- MainWP Child – Securely Connects Sites to the MainWP WordPress Manager Dashboard
channel.description: The latest CVEs for mainwp -- MainWP Child – Securely Connects Sites to the MainWP WordPress Manager Dashboard

item.title: CVE-2023-3132|2024-08-02T06:48:07.872Z -- mainwp -- mainwp%20child%20%E2%80%93%20securely%20connects%20sites%20to%20the%20mainwp%20wordpress%20manager%20dashboard
item.description: The MainWP Child plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Sensitive Information Exposure in versions up to, and including, 4.4.1.1 due to insufficient controls on the storage of back-up files. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to extract sensitive data including the entire installations database if a backup occurs and the deletion of the back-up files fail.
